meanings.definition: A light grayish yellow to light yellowish brown color.
meanings.sent1: The walls of the nursery were painted in a soothing ecrus shade.
meanings.sent2: She wore a beautiful ecrus dress to the wedding.
meanings.sent3: The ecrus balloons at the party looked like giant eggs!
meanings.sent4: The ecrus sky at dawn painted a serene picture.
meanings.sent5: The artist mixed white and yellow to create the perfect ecrus hue.

meanings.definition: A light grayish yellow to light yellowish brown fabric.
meanings.sent1: The tailor used ecrus fabric to make a soft blanket.
meanings.sent2: The curtains in the living room were made of ecrus material.
meanings.sent3: She pretended to be a mummy by wrapping herself in ecrus cloth.
meanings.sent4: The ecrus fabric flowed like a gentle river in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The ecrus scarf felt like a cozy cloud around her neck.
